Class ImageUtilities

  com.jswiff.util.ImageUtilities
public class ImageUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Provides utility methods for image processing.

saveImageAsJPEG

public static void saveImageAsJPEG(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                   java.io.OutputStream stream,
                                   int qualityPercent)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Writes an image to an output stream as a JPEG file. The JPEG quality can be specified in percent.

Parameters:
image - image to be written
stream - target stream
qualityPercent - JPEG quality in percent
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occured
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if qualityPercent not between 0 and 100
